description: State service implementation requires entity definitions.
mitigation_plan: Task is assigned to the same sprint, sequential execution.

description: Controller implementation requires security guards to be available.
mitigation_plan: Security guards are planned for Sprint 1, controller for Sprint 2.
impact_if_delayed: Delays the start of the Order Creation Saga implementation.

description: The migration step is part of the main CI/CD workflow.
mitigation_plan: Both tasks are in Sprint 1, assigned to the same engineer.
impact_if_delayed: Prevents automated database migrations, a critical part of the deployment process.

description: E2E tests for the saga can only be written after the main orchestration logic is complete.
impact_if_delayed: Delays validation of the core business logic.
